body:
Comment 6 by **rmbgm1**: 
Thanks for your time and analysis.  Shortly after submitting this report, I realized I
had not closed
the channel and was going to try that but ghexsel beat me to it and indicated that the
problem
exists even when the channel is closed.   While I accept any semantics you wish to place
on netchans,
I would have to say that not flushing at close-time is quite non-intuitive to me based
on past 
experience.  Thanks again.
--ralph
